 ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ 2.3 - SEIZURES AND PHYSICAL REACTIONS
ANIMATION FROM INTERACTIONS(LEVEL AAA)
On accessible websites...

Motion animation triggered by interaction can be disabled, unless the animation
is essential to the functionality or the information being conveyed.

These websites...

Do not design content in a way that is known to cause seizures or physical
reactions.

WHAT'S AN EXAMPLE?
Essential animation:  * A web application provides a feature to author animated
   sequences. As part of this tool the author needs to preview the animation.
